topics_of_interest: Lambda calculus, type theory, and category theory
invited_speakers: Antoine Girard, University Paris-Saclay, CNRS, France
Klaus Havelund, NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California Institute of Technology, USA
Joost-Pieter Katoen, RWTH Aachen University, Germany
Kim Guldstrand Larsen, Aalborg University, Denmark

publication_info.accepted_papers: All accepted papers will be published in Springer's Lecture Notes in Computer Science.
publication_info.best_paper_award: Springer sponsors the ICTAC 2025 Best Paper Award with a cash prize of 1,000 Euro.
publication_info.special_issue: There will be a special issue for selected papers from ICTAC 2025 in the Elsevier’s journal Theoretical Computer Science.
